response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that this product holds a significant $12,000 value to you. After careful consideration, I propose to offer you the chance to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $11,000. This offer reflects my commitment to ensuring that you receive the best possible deal while maximizing the value I receive for this valuable item. I trust this proposal will meet your expectations and facilitate a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 11000}
